Comments_List: Worked on senior project for linguistics.
I learned how to craft a senior thesis, give comments to peers' projects, write a literature review, and receive feedback from peers and teachers.
Learned more about how to structure a linguistics research paper, the writing/research process behind it, doing my own linguistics research project, etc.
With the purpose of the course being to help students get a feel for doing linguistics research and to brainstorm ideas for each others projects, I think the class was well structured and taught.
Yes, though it's a required course.
Yes, this course is helpful for learning about the research process for linguistics research.
